title.narrative: Red Nose Day 2011 - UK Aid Match - Health and Education

description.narrative: Education: Our goal is to enable left out and marginalised children and young people to get into, stay in and attain good quality, relevant basic education. Also where appropriate, we want to help communities improve the uptake and quality of education in their local area, thereby empowering the community and strengthening children’s learning. Health: Our goal is to contribute to increasing access to primary health care for disadvantaged communities.

activity-date.narrative: Start dates for individual projects within this activity are staggered.This is either the planned end date for the last project within the activity or the due date of the last report to DFID, whichever is the latest.
This is the activity's start date.

mailing-address.narrative: Comic Relief_x000D_ 89 Albert Embankment_x000D_ London _x000D_ SE1 7TP
